hero.title: Ikani Bizinesi Yanu Pa Intaneti.
hero.subtitle: Mwachangu. Motsika Mtengo. Mosavuta.
hero.description: Timathandiza mabizinesi ang'onoang'ono ku South Africa kuti apambane ndi ma website, ma AI automation, ndi zida za digito—popanda mtengo waukulu wa makampani akulu.

painPoints.title: Mukumva Izi?
painPoints.subtitle: Izi ndi mavuto omwe timathetsa tsiku ndi tsiku kwa mabizinesi a South Africa ngati anu

noWebsite.title: Palibe Website Kapena Website Yakale
noWebsite.description: Opikisana nanu ali pa intaneti. Inu simuli. Kapena zoipa—website yanu ikuwoneka ngati yachokera mu 2010.
noWebsite.solution: Landilani website yamakono, yomwe imagwira ntchito pa mafoni m'masiku.

missingAutomation.title: Mukutaya Mwayi wa Automation
missingAutomation.description: Mukugwiritsa ntchito maola ambiri pa ntchito zobwereza monga kuyankha mafunso a makasitomala kapena kukonza magawo.
missingAutomation.solution: Gwiritsirani ntchito automation ndi ma AI chatbots ndi njira zanzeru zogwira ntchito.

cantReach.title: Simungathe Kufikira Msika Wanu Wonse
cantReach.description: South Africa ili ndi zilankhulo zambiri, koma website yanu imalankhula Chingerezi chokha.
cantReach.solution: Lumikizanani ndi makasitomala mu isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, ndi zina.

tooExpensive.title: Ukadaulo Ndi Wodula Kwambiri
tooExpensive.description: Mwauzidwa R50,000+ pamakina oyambira a website. Izi sizotheka kwa mabizinesi ang'onoang'ono.
tooExpensive.solution: Njira zothandiza mwachangu, zotsika mtengo zopangidwa kuti zigwirizane ndi bajeti yanu.

services.title: Tingakuchitirani Chiyani
services.subtitle: Zothandiza za ukadaulo zomwe zimakulitsa bizinesi yanu

cta.title: Muli Okonzeka Kukweza Bizinesi Yanu?
cta.description: Landilani ulangizi ndi chiwerengero chaulere. Palibe kukakamizidwa, uphungu weniweni chokha pa zomwe zingagwire ntchito pa bizinesi yanu.

hero.title: Ntchito Zomwe Zimakulitsa Bizinesi Yanu
hero.subtitle: Mwachangu, motsika mtengo, ndipo zenizeni zothandiza. Sankhani zomwe mukufuna—kapena lumikizani kuti mupeze zotsatira zazikulu.

website.title: Kupanga ndi Kukweza Ma Website
website.tagline: Sitolo yanu ya digito yomwe imagwira ntchito 24/7
website.description: Website ya akatswiri si chinthu cha kukondwerera—ndichofunikira. Timamanga ma website othamanga, amakono, omwe amagwira ntchito pa mafoni omwe amabweretsa makasitomala zenizeni.

aiAutomation.title: AI Automation ndi Ma Chatbot
aiAutomation.description: Lekani kugwiritsa ntchito maola ambiri pa ntchito zobwereza. Zothandiza zathu za AI zimagwira mafunso a makasitomala, zimayesa otsogolera, ndipo zimagwiritsa ntchito automation—kuti muthe kuyang'ana pakukula kwa bizinesi.

customApps.title: Ma App Opangidwa Mwapadera ndi Zida
customApps.tagline: Thetsani mavuto anu apadera a bizinesi
customApps.description: Mukufuna china chake chapadera? Timamanga ma app osavuta, ogwira ntchito bwino opangidwa kuti agwirizane ndi njira yanu yogwira ntchito—makina osungira malo, osungira zinthu, malo a makasitomala, ndi zina.

googleBusiness.title: Kukhazikitsa Google Business Profile
googleBusiness.description: Onekerani pamene anthu m'dera lanu akufunafuna zomwe mumapereka. Timakweza Google Business Profile yanu kuti muonekere pa Ma Maps ndi Kusaka.

digitalMarketing.title: Ma Package Oyamba a Digital Marketing
digitalMarketing.description: Malonda osavuta, ogwira ntchito omwe agwirizana ndi bajeti yanu. Kukhazikitsa ma social media, maziko a Google Ads, ma campaign a imelo—tikukuyambitsani njira yabwino.

consulting.title: Uphungu wa Digital Transformation
consulting.description: Simukudziwa koyamba? Tiwunika bizinesi yanu, tizindikira mwayi, ndikupanga njira yeniyeni yakukula kwa digito—palibe jargon, uphungu womveka bwino chokha.

whyUs.title: Chifukwa Chiyani Mugwire Ntchito Nafe?
whyUs.subtitle: Sitifanana ndi makampani akulu omwe ali ndi nthawi ya miyezi 6 ndi jargon ya kampani

fastDelivery.title: Kupereka Mwachangu
fastDelivery.description: Ma project ambiri amaperekedwa m'masiku, osati miyezi. Mudzawona zotsatira mwachangu.

clearComm.title: Kulumikizana Komveka
clearComm.description: Palibe jargon ya ukadaulo. Timalongosola zonse m'chilankhulo chomveka kuti mumvetsetse zomwe mukulandira.

results.title: Kuyang'ana pa Zotsatira
results.description: Timamanga zinthu zomwe zimathandiza bizinesi yanu kukula zenizeni—makasitomala ambiri, ntchito yochepa yamanja, kuwonekera kwabwino.

services.ctaDescription: Sungani uphungu waulere. Tidzalankhula za zolinga zanu za bizinesi ndikukulangizani zothandiza zabwino za bajeti yanu.

hero.title: Zotsatira Zenizeni kwa Mabizinesi Enieni
hero.subtitle: Onani momwe tathandizira mabizinesi ang'onoang'ono a South Africa kukula ndi zothandiza za ukadaulo zogwira ntchito

testimonials.title: Zomwe Makasitomala Athu Akunena
testimonials.subtitle: Musangotengan mawu athu okha—nanga zomwe eni mabizinesi enieni akunena

portfolio.ctaTitle: Muli Okonzeka Kuwona Zotsatira Ngati Izi?
portfolio.ctaDescription: Tiyeni tilankhule za zolinga zanu za bizinesi ndikupanga dongosolo lomwe limagwira ntchito zenizeni.

hero.title: Timathandiza Mabizinesi a South Africa Kupambana Pa Intaneti
hero.subtitle: Zothandiza za ukadaulo mwachangu, motsika mtengo popanda zopanda pake za kampani

values.title: Zomwe Timaimirira
values.subtitle: Miyezo yathu imayendetsa zonse zomwe timachita

strengths.title: Mphamvu Zathu
strengths.subtitle: Zomwe zimatisiyanitsa ndi opereka ukadaulo ena

whySA.title: Chifukwa Chiyani Mabizinesi a South Africa Akufunikira Zothandiza za Digito
whySA.subtitle: Zenizeni za bizinesi yaying'ono ku South Africa lero

approach.title: Njira Yathu Yopereka Mwachangu
approach.subtitle: Mmene timapezera zotsatira mwachangu popanda kusokoneza khalidwe

about.ctaDescription: Muli okonzeka kukweza bizinesi yanu m'masiku, osati miyezi? Tiyeni tilankhule—palibe kukakamizidwa, uphungu weniweni chokha.

hero.title: Tiyeni Timange Chinthu Chabwino Pamodzi
hero.subtitle: Landilani chiwerengero chaulere ndi uphungu weniweni. Palibe kukakamizidwa, palibe jargon.

form.title: Landilani Chiwerengero Chaulere
form.description: Lembani mafotolo pansipa ndipo tidzabwerera kwa inu mkati mwa maola 24 ndi malingaliro omveka.
form.name: Dzina Lanu
form.messagePlaceholder: Mukufuna thandizo pa chiyani? Zolinga zanu n'zotani?
form.successMessage: Talandila uthenga wanu ndipo tidzabwerera kwa inu mkati mwa maola 24.

whatsappCta.title: Mukonda WhatsApp?
whatsappCta.description: Landilani mayankho mwachangu pa mafunso anu. Lankhulani nafe tsopano!

footer.description: Zothandiza za ukadaulo mwachangu, motsika mtengo kwa mabizinesi a South Africa. Timathandiza ma SME kupambana m'nthawi ya digito.
